name: OverTheSpeedLimit
description:
Over The Speed Limit

A challenging racing game where speed is everything .
Put your racing skills to the test and race in different conditions where loosing friction can cost you the 1st place .
Play with the in car camera for a vr perspective (vr compatible) .
Win Races , make money , unlock access to new racing levels , new racing classes , Drag races , and customization .

Racing classes :

normal cars class

Customised cars class

Sports car class

Higher classes need more attention to braking and slowing down in corners .

Adding more cars is subject to consider in the future .

The use of a Steering wheel is supported and recommended for this game.

Note : For full gamepad support , the gamepad needs to be properly installed on Windows with an installed driver , otherwise you will only have partlial gamepad functionality (the gamepad will work only on game play ).
